name: Creative Photography Studio
description: A fully-equipped photography studio perfect for professional and amateur photographers alike. With high ceilings, customizable lighting setups, and a variety of backdrops, this space is ideal for photo shoots, product photography, portrait sessions, and more. The studio offers flexible layouts, and modern equipment, and can be easily adapted to suit different creative visions. Whether you're a solo photographer or working with a team, our studio provides a comfortable and professional environment for all your photography needs.
rules: No smoking. Handle equipment with care. Clean up after your session.

name: Vision Room Studios
description: Vision Room Studios is a modern studio, fully equipped with professional lighting and diverse backdrops, suitable for all photography needs from personal, group, to product shoots. With spacious areas and elegant design, the studio offers you maximum flexibility and creativity. Especially, Vision Room Studios provides all the necessary equipment to allow you the freedom to design and capture high-quality photos as you wish.
rules: No loud music or calls. Quiet workspace.
